section.title: Supported CURL Options
section.description: The following CURL options are supported. For more information about these options, see the [CURL documentation].

item.name: ACCEPT_ENCODING
item.description: Sets the contents of the Accept-Encoding: header sent in an HTTP request.

item.name: ACCEPTTIMEOUT_MS
item.description: Timeout for waiting for the server's connect back to be accepted.

item.name: ADDRESS_SCOPE
item.description: IPv6 scope for local addresses.

item.name: APPEND
item.description: Append to remote file. Numeric.

item.name: AUTOREFERER
item.description: Sets the Referer: header field in HTTP requests.

item.name: CAINFO
item.description: Sets CA certificate bundle.

item.name: CAPATH
item.description: Sets Path to CA certificate bundle.

item.name: CERTINFO
item.description: Set to 1 to enable certificate chain info gatherer.

item.name: COPYPOSTFIELDS
item.description: Send a POST with this data - and copy it.

item.name: COOKIE
item.description: Set Cookie(s) in the format NAME=CONTENTS

item.name: COOKIEFILE
item.description: Set File to read cookies from.

item.name: COOKIEJAR
item.description: Set File to write cookies to.

item.name: COOKIELIST
item.description: Add or control cookies

item.name: COOKIESESSION
item.description: Start a new cookie session

item.name: CONNECT_ONLY
item.description: Only connect, no data sent.

item.name: CONNECTTIMEOUT
item.description: Timeout for the connection phase.

item.name: CONNECTTIMEOUT_MS
item.description: Timeout for the connection phase expressed in milliseconds.

item.name: CUSTOMREQUEST
item.description: Set Cusotm request/method (i.e. PUT/PATCH/DELETE etc.)

item.name: DIRLISTONLY
item.description: Set to 1 tells the library to list the names of files ina directory.

item.name: DNS_CACHE_TIMEOUT
item.description: Timeout for DNS cache.

item.name: DNS_INTERFACE
item.description: Bind name resolves to this interface.

item.name: DNS_LOCAL_IP4
item.description: Bind name resolves to this IP4 address.

item.name: DNS_LOCAL_IP6
item.description: Bind name resolves to this IP6 address.

item.name: DNS_SERVERS
item.description: Set Preferred DNS servers.

item.name: EGDSOCKET
item.description: Identify EGD socket for entropy.

item.name: FAILONERROR
item.description: CURL call should fail on hTTP 4xx errors.

item.name: FILE
item.description: Set file (Pass a [Extension::CurlFile])

item.name: FILETIME
item.description: Request file modification date and time.

item.name: FOLLOWLOCATION
item.description: Follow HTTP redirects.

item.name: FORBID_REUSE
item.description: Prevent subsequent connections from re-using this connection.

item.name: FRESH_CONNECT
item.description: Use a new connection for this request.

item.name: FTP_ACCOUNT
item.description: Send FTP ACCT command

item.name: FTP_ALTERNATIVE_TO_USER
item.description: Alternative to USER.

item.name: FTP_CREATE_MISSING_DIRS
item.description: Create missing directories on the remote server.

item.name: FTP_FILEMETHOD
item.description: Specify how to reach files.

item.name: FTP_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT
item.description: Timeout for FTP responses.

item.name: FTP_SKIP_PASV_IP
item.description: Ignore the IP address in the PASV response.

item.name: FTP_SSL_CCC
item.description: Set back to non-TLS again after authentication.

item.name: FTP_USE_EPRT
item.description: Set to 1 tells CURL to use EPRT command when doing active FTP downloads.

item.name: FTP_USE_EPSV
item.description: Set to 1 tells CURL to use EPSV command when doing passive FTP.

item.name: FTP_USE_PRET
item.description: Set to 1 tells CURL to send a PRET command before PASV.

item.name: FTPPORT
item.description: Set port FTP transfer will use in Active mode.

item.name: FTPSSLAUTH
item.description: Control how to do TLS (USE_SSL must be set.)

item.name: GSSAPI_DELEGATION
item.description: Disable GSS-API delegation.

item.name: HEADER
item.description: Include the header in the body output.

item.name: HTTP_CONTENT_DECODING
item.description: Disable Content decoding.

item.name: HTTP_TRANSFER_DECODING
item.description: Disable Transfer decoding.

item.name: HTTP_VERSION
item.description: Specify which HTTP version to use.

item.name: HTTPAUTH
item.description: Set HTTP server authentication methods.

item.name: HTTPGET
item.description: Do a HTTP GET request.

item.name: HTTPHEADER
item.description: Specify HTTP headers - pass a character array of header entries.

item.name: HTTPPOST
item.description: Specify multipart formpost HTTP POST, pass a property array.

item.name: HTTPPROXYTUNNEL
item.description: Tunnel through the HTTP proxy.

item.name: IGNORE_CONTENT_LENGTH
item.description: Ignore Content-Length for FTP transfers.

item.name: INFILE
item.description: Set infile for posting data to request (pass an [Extension::CurlFile])

item.name: INFILESIZE
item.description: Set size of file being sent to endpoint.

item.name: INTERFACE
item.description: Bind name resolves to this interface.

item.name: IPRESOLVE
item.description: IP version to resolve to.

item.name: ISSUERCERT
item.description: Set Issuer certificate.

item.name: KEYPASSWD
item.description: Set Client key password.

item.name: KRBLEVEL
item.description: Set Kerberos security level.

item.name: LOCALPORT
item.description: Bind connection locally to this port.

item.name: LOCALPORTRANGE
item.description: Bind connection locally to port range.

item.name: LOGIN_OPTIONS
item.description: Login options string to use for the transfer.

item.name: LOW_SPEED_LIMIT
item.description: Low speed limit to abort transfer.

item.name: LOW_SPEED_TIME
item.description: Time to be below the speed to trigger low speed abort.

item.name: MAIL_AUTH
item.description: Authentication address.

item.name: MAIL_FROM
item.description: Address of the sender.

item.name: MAIL_RCPT
item.description: Address of the recipients.

item.name: MAXCONNECTS
item.description: Maximum number of connections in the connection pool.

item.name: MAXFILESIZE
item.description: Maximum file size to get.

item.name: MAXREDIRS
item.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow.

item.name: NETRC
item.description: Enable netrc parsing.

item.name: NETRC_FILE
item.description: Specify netrc filename.

item.name: NEW_DIRECTORY_PERMS
item.description: Mode for creating new remote directories.

item.name: NEW_FILE_PERMS
item.description: Mode for creating new remote files.

item.name: NOBODY
item.description: Do not get the body contents.

item.name: NOPROXY
item.description: Filter out hosts from proxy use.

item.name: PASSWORD
item.description: Specify password to use fro basic authentication

item.name: PORT
item.description: Port number to connect to.

item.name: POST
item.description: Issue a HTTP POST request.

item.name: POSTFIELDS
item.description: Send a POST with this data.

item.name: POSTFIELDSIZE
item.description: Set the size of the POSt data.

item.name: POSTREDIR
item.description: How to act on redirects after POST

item.name: PROGRESS
item.description: Hook to show progress (pass an [Extension::CurlProgress].)

item.name: PROTOCOLS
item.description: Set Allowed protocols.

item.name: PROXY_TRANSFER_MODE
item.description: Add transfer mode to URL over proxy.

item.name: PROXYAUTH
item.description: HTTP proxy authentication methods.

item.name: PROXYPASSWORD
item.description: Set Proxy password.

item.name: PROXYPORT
item.description: Set Proxy port to use.

item.name: PROXYTYPE
item.description: Set Proxy Type

item.name: PROXYUSERNAME
item.description: Set Proxy user name.

item.name: PROXYUSERPWD
item.description: Set Proxy user name and password.

item.name: PUT
item.description: Issue a HTTP PUT request.

item.name: RANDOM_FILE
item.description: Provide source for entropy random data for SSL.

item.name: RANGE
item.description: Set range for getting partial response, in bytes format X-Y. E.g. "0-199"

item.name: REDIR_PROTOCOLS
item.description: Protocols to allow redirects to

item.name: REFERER
item.description: Set the Referer: header in the HTTP request.

item.name: RESUME_FROM
item.description: Offset in bytes that the transfer resumes from

item.name: RTSP_CLIENT_CSEQ
item.description: CSEQ number to issue for the next RTSP request.

item.name: RTSP_REQUEST
item.description: Type of RTSP request.

item.name: RTSP_SERVER_CSEQ
item.description: Set the CSEQ number to expect for the next RTSP Server Client request.

item.name: RTSP_SESSION_ID
item.description: Set the value of the current RTSP session ID for the handle.

item.name: RTSP_STREAM_URI
item.description: Set the stream URI.

item.name: RTSP_TRANSPORT
item.description: Set the value of Transport: header for this RTSP session.

item.name: SASL_IR
item.description: Enable SASL initial response

item.name: SOCKS5_GSSAPI_NEC
item.description: Socks5 GSSAPI NEC mode

item.name: SOCKS5_GSSAPI_SERVICE
item.description: Socks5 GSSAPI service name.

item.name: SSH_AUTH_TYPES
item.description: SSH authentication types.

item.name: SSH_HOST_PUBLIC_KEY_MD5
item.description: Set MD5 of host's public key.

item.name: SSH_KNOWNHOSTS
item.description: Filename containing known hosts.

item.name: SSH_PRIVATE_KEYFILE
item.description: Filename of the private key.

item.name: SSH_PUBLIC_KEYFILE
item.description: Filename of the public key.

item.name: SSL_CIPHER_LIST
item.description: List of ciphers to use for SSL connection.

item.name: SSL_OPTIONS
item.description: Control SSL behavior.

item.name: SSL_SESSIONID_CACHE
item.description: Cache or don't cache SSl session IDs.

item.name: SSL_VERIFYHOST
item.description: Verify the host name in the SSL certificate.

item.name: SSL_VERIFYPEER
item.description: Verify the SSL certificate.

item.name: SSLCERT
item.description: Set filename for the client certificate.

item.name: SSLCERTTYPE
item.description: Format of the certificate, either 'PEM' or 'DER'

item.name: SSLENGINE
item.description: Use identify with SSL engine.

item.name: SSLENGINE_DEFAULT
item.description: Set to 1 to mae the already specified crypto engine the default for all crypto operations.

item.name: SSLKEY
item.description: Filename of the private key.

item.name: SSLKEYTYPE
item.description: Specify format of the private key - 'PEM', 'DER' or 'ENG'.

item.name: SSLVERSION
item.description: Set SSL version.

item.name: TCP_KEEPALIVE
item.description: Enable TCP keep-alive

item.name: TCP_KEEPIDLE
item.description: Idle time before sending keep-alive

item.name: TCP_KEEPINTVL
item.description: Set interval between keep-alive probes.

item.name: TCP_NODELAY
item.description: Disable the Nagle algorithm.

item.name: TFTP_BLKSIZE
item.description: Set blocksize to use for TFTP data transmissions (default is 512)

item.name: TIMECONDITION
item.description: Make a time conditional request.

item.name: TIMEOUT
item.description: Timeout for the entire request.

item.name: TIMEOUT_MS
item.description: Timeout for the entire request in milliseconds.

item.name: TIMEVALUE
item.description: Time value for the time conditional request.

item.name: TLSAUTH_PASSWORD
item.description: Set TLS authentication password

item.name: TLSAUTH_TYPE
item.description: TLS authentication methods

item.name: TLSAUTH_USERNAME
item.description: TLS authentication user name

item.name: TRANSFER_ENCODING
item.description: Adds a request for compressed Transfer Encoding if supported by server.

item.name: TRANSFERTEXT
item.description: Set to 1 to use ASCII mode for FTP transfers.

item.name: UNRESTRICTED_AUTH
item.description: Do not restrict authentication to original host.

item.name: UPLOAD
item.description: Set to 1 to perform an upload.

item.name: URL
item.description: The URL endpoint to use.

item.name: USE_SSL
item.description: Use TSL/SSL

item.name: USERAGENT
item.description: Set the User-Agent: header in the HTTP request.

item.name: USERNAME
item.description: Set the user name.

item.name: USERPWD
item.description: Set the user name and password.

item.name: XOAUTH2_BEARER
item.description: Specify the OAuth 2.0 Bearer Access Tokent to use.
